typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MIBI_AccountYearMonth as decimal,
	MIBI_ProcessName as integer,
	MIBI_ProcessType as any,
	MIBI_DailyGroupNum as any,
	MIBI_RegionCode as any,
	MIBI_PremiumType as any
}
source(output(
		DUMMY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> scVDUAL
scVDUAL filter(false()) ~> filfilNoRecords
filfilNoRecords sink(mapColumn(
		DUMMY
	)) ~> scVDUAL1
